name: Sixteen Horses: Prologue
description:
Make sure sound is on. A PC or Mac running a desktop browser such as Firefox or Chrome is recommended. Press Esc to exit fullscreen.
 PREORDER (UK) PREORDER (US) April 29 UK / July 20 USA Sixteen horse heads are found buried in circles on a farm near the sea. 

A local police officer & a forensic veterinarian investigate a chain of connected crimes... but soon find themselves unable to leave town, stalked by an unseen force.

Sixteen Horses: Prologue is an interactive teaser co-developed by author Greg Buchanan (No Man's Sky: Atlas Rises, Metro: Exodus) and G.C. Baccaris (Devotionalia, The Twine Grimoire), also featuring the work of Trevor Henderson (creator of Siren Head). It presents the first chapter of the upcoming novel Sixteen Horses, described by Waterstones as "a darkly atmospheric crime thriller that shades at times into horror."

“Poignant, chilling, eerie, and gruesome, SIXTEEN HORSES is a thriller with a literary soul, perfect for fans of Netflix's Dark or BBC's Top of the Lake. - Sara Sligar
